subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Casey McGehee had two walks, two runs and an R.B.I., and Joba Chamberlain threw one and two-thirds innings in his first major league appearance since June 5, 2011.
snippet: Casey McGehee had two walks, two runs and an R.B.I., and Joba Chamberlain threw one and two-thirds innings in his first major league appearance since June 5, 2011.
